name: Golisopod
description: With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawater—or even air—right in two.

abilities.name: Emergency Exit
abilities.effect: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.
abilities.description: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
